long_description: The stylish and easy-to-use Saris Axis Aluminum 3-bike hitch mount carries 3 bikes in a super-lightweight package. Frame is constructed of lightweight aluminum and fits both 2 and 1.25 in. hitch sizes. Arms feature integrated hold-downs and ratcheting, anti-sway straps to secure and stabilize bikes, and prevent bike-to-bike contact. Frame tilts down for easy access to trunk or rear of vehicle; bikes must be removed to use tilting feature. The Saris Axis Steel Hitch 3-bike rack carries 3 bikes up to 35 lbs. each. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: The stylish and easy-to-use Saris Axis Aluminum 3-bike hitch mount carries 3 bikes in a super-lightweight package.
